ghostPost.title: Ghost admin not loading
ghostPost.excerpt: Find out how to resolve issues if Ghost admin will not load for self-hosted developers.
ghostPost.meta_title: What to do when Ghost-admin is not loading - FAQ
ghostPost.meta_description: Find out how to resolve issues if Ghost admin will not load for self-hosted developers.

ghostPost.plaintext:
If you've added CloudFlare to your site, you may find that Ghost Admin doesn't
load after updates.

Errors
Open developer tools to check for errors in the JavaScript code:

TypeError: n.item is not a function  or Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected string 
 

To fix
It is recommended that you add a page rule which turns off some RocketLoader,
mirage2 and autominify for the path /ghost*, so these features don't affect the
Ghost admin panel.

This solution is for developers who are maintaining a self-hosted instance of
Ghost. If you're on Ghost(Pro) both nginx and CloudFlare are configured as
standard and you don't need to do anything.
ghostPost.html:
If you've added CloudFlare to your site, you may find that Ghost Admin doesn't load after updates.

Errors

Open developer tools to check for errors in the JavaScript code:

TypeError: n.item is not a function or Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected string

To fix

It is recommended that you add a page rule which turns off some RocketLoader, mirage2 and autominify for the path /ghost*, so these features don't affect the Ghost admin panel.

This solution is for developers who are maintaining a self-hosted instance of Ghost. If you're on Ghost(Pro) both nginx and CloudFlare are configured as standard and you don't need to do anything.
